name: The Stevie Awards • Young Customer Service Professional of the Year
description: Recognized the achievements of contact center, customer service, business development and sales professionals worldwide

name: IBM • MHV New Hire of the Month
description: Awarded due to leading multiple high-impact projects that improve efficiency and usability while being with IBM less than a year

name: IBM • Entrepreneur of 2025 Award
description: Recognized after the realease of Kika Calendar, a time logging tool that is now used across the Infra. organization

name: IBM • Jumpstart People's Choice Award
description: Created Cerebro, a Python package vulnerability scanner. Develoved using Python, OSV, Flaska and Pandas

name: HSBPC • John Castle Award
description: Designed, developed, and delivered a barcode-less kiosk system that uses computer vision to recognize products, attracting investors to Verescan

name: INRIX x AWS Hackathon • 1st Place
description: Developed a web application that uses INRIX's traffic data to predict car accidents and display them on a heat map. Built with React, Node.js, and AWS
